DOC.brief_title: Adapalene Gel 0.3 % Versus Tretinoin 0.05 % Emollient Cream Treatment Photodamage
DOC.criteria: Male Female age 40 year age old Fitzpatrick skin type I III Clinically moderate severe photodamage Subjects history laser resurfacing , dermabrasion , medium deep chemical peel face Subjects diagnosis skin cancer within 3 month study entry Subjects superficial chemical peel , exfoliation microdermabrasion face within 3 month study entry Subjects botulinum toxin facial rejuvenation within 6 month study entry unwilling refrain botulinum toxin treatment study
